thread.title: Best location in Stellenbosch -
thread.title_full: Best location in Stellenbosch - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: DJMohr
title: Best location in Stellenbosch -
text:
Service is great!
Rooms of the appartment didn't fully meet expectations, but everything was clean and functional.
The fact that the aircon exhaust required an open window facing the inner yard caused noise and kitchen pollution .
Location is prime, all cafes and restaurants in walking distance.
